channel.title: CVE Feed for Foreman Project -- Foreman
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Foreman Project -- Foreman

item.title: CVE-2018-1097|2024-08-05T03:51:48.439Z -- foreman%20project -- foreman
item.description: A flaw was found in foreman before 1.16.1. The issue allows users with limited permissions for powering oVirt/RHV hosts on and off to discover the username and password used to connect to the compute resource.

item.title: CVE-2018-1096|2024-08-05T03:51:48.492Z -- foreman%20project -- foreman
item.description: An input sanitization flaw was found in the id field in the dashboard controller of Foreman before 1.16.1. A user could use this flaw to perform an SQL injection attack on the back end database.
